dcterms:description: A dataset containing 147,702 products with multiple images and textual metadata, where the number of images per product ranges from 2 to 21. The dataset is used to improve generative tasks by providing fine-grained visual representations.
dcterms:title: Amazon Berkeley Objects Dataset (ABO)
